channel.title: Setting A Command
channel.description: Ok well my client has a Screenshot option on the menu bar and i want to set it to a hotkey so if they hit print screen it automaticly Takes a screenshot and saves in screenshot folder anyone know how to do this?

item.title: Setting A Command
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

idk what type of cilent u r using but u need to use a key pressed event you can read more at http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/awt/event/KeyEvent.html#VK_PRINTSCREEN
ill write a sample snippet one: to help u and two: just encase i want to use this idea.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 02, 2008, 06:02:51 pm[/size][hr]for galkons client this goes under KeyPressed events in Applet_Sub1if(i == KeyEvent.VK_PRINTSCREEN)// self-explained takeScreenshot(true);//action to take screen shot
that code wonâ€™t work one: i am not the most experienced programmer(who would like a better programmer to help build my skills) two: i ownly spent a few seconds on it. But that is basicly all thats needed. and no flamen if you/anyone has a correct method please help me learn my mistake i am willing to learn but pretty much all i know is the basics. A dream i have is for one PS community to get along and work on one massive server together and the ones not capable via no experience to be taught by the heros/master of that community. now that community would be and have the most revolutionized server.
